00031 EuclideanClusteringPCL::EuclideanClusteringPCL() {
00032         this-> minClusterSize =0;
00033         this->maxClusterSize =0;
00034         this->clusterTolerance =0;
00035 }

00041 int EuclideanClusteringPCL::segment(){
00042         assert (this->inputPointCloud != 0);
00043         extractClusters(this->inputPointCloud);
00044         return 1;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void EuclideanClusteringPCL::extractClusters(brics_3d::PointCloud3D *inCloud){
00048 
00049         brics_3d::PCLTypecaster pclTypecaster;
00050         extractedClusters.clear();
00051         //converting input cloud into PCL format
00052         pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr inCloudPclPtr(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> ());
00053         pclTypecaster.convertToPCLDataType(inCloudPclPtr, inCloud);
00054 
00055         std::cout << "Ecledian: inCloud size =" << inCloud->getSize() << " inCloudPclPtr size = " << inCloudPclPtr->points.size() << std::endl;
00056 
00057         // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
00058         pcl::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr tree (new pcl::KdTreeFLANN<pcl::PointXYZ>);
00059         tree->setInputCloud (inCloudPclPtr);
00060         std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> cluster_indices;
00061         pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZ> euclideanClusterExtractor;
00062         euclideanClusterExtractor.setClusterTolerance (this->clusterTolerance); // 2cm
00063         euclideanClusterExtractor.setMinClusterSize (this->minClusterSize);
00064         euclideanClusterExtractor.setMaxClusterSize (this->maxClusterSize);
00065         euclideanClusterExtractor.setSearchMethod (tree);
00066         euclideanClusterExtractor.setInputCloud(inCloudPclPtr);
00067         euclideanClusterExtractor.extract (cluster_indices);
00068 
00069                 printf("Parameters used or extraction:\n \t Min Cluster Size = %d\n"
00070                                 "\tMax Cluster Size=%d\n"
00071                         "\tCluster Tolerance=%f\n Number of objects found: %d\n", this->minClusterSize,
00072                                 this->maxClusterSize, this->clusterTolerance, cluster_indices.size());
00073                 printf("[EuclideanClusterExtraction.cpp][checkpoint] size of input cloud is %d\n", inCloud->getSize());
00074         //      //Building up the pointclouds for corresponding clusters
00075         int index =0;
00076         for (std::vector<pcl::PointIndices>::const_iterator it = cluster_indices.begin (); it != cluster_indices.end (); ++it){
00077 
00078                 extractedClusters.push_back(new brics_3d::PointCloud3D());
00079 
00080                 //extractedClusters.data()[index]->getPointCloud()->clear();
00081                 for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator pit = it->indices.begin (); pit != it->indices.end (); pit++){
00082                         extractedClusters.data()[index]->addPointPtr(new Point3D(       inCloudPclPtr->points[*pit].x,
00083                                         inCloudPclPtr->points[*pit].y,
00084                                         inCloudPclPtr->points[*pit].z) );
00085                 }
00086                 printf("[EuclideanClusterExtraction.cpp][checkpoint] size of cluster is %d\n", extractedClusters.data()[index]->getSize());
00087                 index++;
00088         }
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 }
